content: धनं [धन्-अच्] {@--1@} Property, wealth, riches, treasure, money (gold, chattels &c.); धनं तावदसुलभं <ls>H. 1</ls>; (<ab>fig.</ab> also), an in तपोधन, विद्याधन, &c. {@--2@} ({%a%}) Any valued possession, an object of affection or endearment, dearest treasure; कष्टं जनः कुलधनरैनुरंजनीयः <ls>U. 1. 14</ls>; गुरोरपीदं धनमाहिताग्नेः <ls>R. 2. 44</ls>; मानधन, अभिमान° &c. ({%b%}) A valuable article; <ls>Ms. 8. 201</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 8.">202.</ls> {@--3@} Capital, (<ab>opp.</ab> वृद्धि or interest). {@--4@} A booty, prey, spoil. {@--5@} The reward given to a victor in a combat, the prize won in a game. {@--6@} A contest for prizes, a match. {@--7@} The lunar mansion called धनिष्ठा. {@--8@} Surplus, residue. {@--9@} (In math.) The affirmative quantity or plus (<ab>opp.</ab> ऋण). {@--10@} A sound.
